name: Buooy Aviary Editor
author: Aaron Lee

sections.description:
Buooy Aviary Editor allows you to utilize the powerful Aviary Photo Editor to make changes right from the WordPress Admin.

Adobe Aviary come with the following powerful features (https://developers.aviary.com/features):

  • Enhance : Hi-Def intelligently sharpens and defines; Illuminate fixes poor lighting issues; and Color Fix performs amazing color correction.
  • Effects : A curated collection of over 100 of Aviary’s best photo effects.
  • Frames & Stickers : Support and enhance your users’ creativity with stunning graphics, word art, embellishments, frames and more, all made by Aviary’s top-notch design team.
  • Crop, Resize & Rotate : Quickly reframe, resize and rotate photo with intuitive tools and preset image cropping options
  • Adjustments : Modify brightness, contrast, saturation, warmth and sharpness with our handy adjust tool.
  • Focus, Splash & Meme : Create a meme, selectively add or subtract color and change the focus of images (“tilt-shift”) with our Meme, Splash, and Focus tools.
  • Draw & Text : Mark up or doodle on photos before sharing them with intuitive Draw and Text tools. Preset colors help you make your point, fast.
  • Cosmetic Tools : Remove red eye, whiten teeth, and magically remove blemishes with our convenient set of cosmetic tools.

For support, chat us up at http://support.buooy.com/
sections.installation:
1. Upload the full folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Do I need an API Key?

Yes you do! You can get your API Key from https://creativesdk.adobe.com/. More information is found in the settings page after you installed the plugin.

Does it work on localhost?

The short answer is NO.
